pages.text: $(9)Obliteration$() is another brand new anvil exclusive enchantment.$(p)An obliteration anvil can convert a single enchanted book with exactly one enchantment into two enchanted books, each one level lower.

Essentially, an obliteration anvil can perform the inverse of combining two enchantments.$(p)To use an obliteration anvil, throw an enchanted book into the world, and place the anvil so that it lands on top of the book.
